comments: This sequence coincides with sequence A097328 of denominators of 1+1/5+1/9+1/13+...+1/(4n+1) iff n<12. - _T. D. Noe_, Aug 04 2004
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..200
mathematica: Table[ Apply[ LCM, Join[{1}, Table[1 + 4i, {i, 0, n}]]], {n, 0, 19}]nn=20;Table[LCM@@Take[4Range[0,nn-1]+1,n],{n,nn}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 04 2011 *)
prog: (MAGMA) k:=77; [Lcm([h: h in [1..j by 4]]): j in [1..k by 4]];  // _Bruno Berselli_, May 03 2011
